name: Agent C (noname_tretiak)
description:
Well, this is my third game of all time. I'm completely unprofessional at this point, but i hope the game isn't too bad as i think. Hope you'll enjoy it!

There can be a couple of bugs and broken mechanics , if you found some of them, tell me in the comments, i'll try to fix them. So, good luck!

There you can check the game's soundtrack , if you want to:

https://www.youtube.com/@nonametretiak
